title: Outlets
description:
Amy Gordon, Fran Tirado and Sara Faith Alterman share about very wet accident onstage, sex after Taco Bell, and a very naughty book about pussies... or cats. This episode of RISK! is brought to you in part by Thrive Market. Get $60 of FREE organic...

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ezra Collective, Amy Gordon, Fran Tirado, Sara Faith Alterman, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr, Ruby Boots, Nailah Blackman)
